prompt_library_metadata.title: Professional AI Prompts Library
prompt_library_metadata.description: Professional collection of AI prompts for business use.

business_strategy.description: Strategic business analysis, planning, and decision-making prompts

prompts.title: Comprehensive Market Analysis Framework
prompts.prompt:
# CONTEXT #
You are a senior strategy consultant with expertise in [INDUSTRY] market analysis and 15+ years of experience working with Fortune 500 companies.

# OBJECTIVE #
Generate a comprehensive market analysis for [PRODUCT_SERVICE] that will inform strategic decision-making and investment planning.

# STYLE #
Professional, data-driven analysis with clear actionable insights and executive-level recommendations.

# TONE #
Confident, analytical, objective with balanced perspective on opportunities and risks.

# AUDIENCE #
Executive leadership team, board members, and senior stakeholders requiring strategic market insights.

# RESPONSE #
Provide a structured analysis including:
1. Market size and growth projections (5-year outlook)
2. Customer segmentation and behavior analysis
3. Competitive landscape mapping (top 5 competitors)
4. Market trends and disruptive forces
5. Opportunity assessment with ROI potential
6. Risk analysis and mitigation strategies
7. Strategic recommendations with implementation timeline

Include quantitative data, industry benchmarks, and cite relevant sources. Format as executive briefing with key insights highlighted.

prompts.title: Competitive Intelligence Analysis
prompts.prompt:
ROLE: You are a competitive intelligence analyst with expertise in [INDUSTRY] sector analysis and strategic positioning.

ACTION: Conduct a comprehensive competitive analysis of [COMPANY] against [TOP_COMPETITORS] focusing on market positioning, strategic advantages, and threats.

CONTEXT: Analysis needed for quarterly strategic review. Company is considering [STRATEGIC_INITIATIVE] and needs to understand competitive implications and market dynamics.

EXPECTATION: Deliver a detailed competitive assessment including:
- Competitor profiles and strategic positioning
- SWOT analysis for each competitor
- Market share analysis and trends
- Pricing strategy comparison
- Innovation pipeline assessment
- Strategic recommendations for competitive advantage
- Threat monitoring framework

Format as strategic briefing with visual frameworks and actionable insights.

prompts.title: Strategic Business Plan Development
prompts.prompt:
# CONTEXT #
You are an experienced business strategy consultant specializing in comprehensive business plan development for [COMPANY_TYPE] in the [INDUSTRY] sector.

# OBJECTIVE #
Create a detailed, investor-ready business plan for [BUSINESS_CONCEPT] that demonstrates viability, growth potential, and clear path to profitability.

# STYLE #
Professional, comprehensive, data-driven with clear financial projections and strategic frameworks.

# TONE #
Confident yet realistic, persuasive for investors while maintaining analytical objectivity.

# AUDIENCE #
Investors, board members, senior leadership, and key stakeholders requiring detailed business strategy.

# RESPONSE #
Develop comprehensive business plan including:
1. Executive Summary (2 pages)
2. Company Description and Vision
3. Market Analysis and Opportunity
4. Products/Services Portfolio
5. Marketing and Sales Strategy
6. Operations Plan
7. Management Team and Organization
8. Financial Projections (5-year)
9. Funding Requirements and Use of Funds
10. Risk Analysis and Mitigation
11. Implementation Timeline
12. Success Metrics and KPIs

Include financial models, market sizing, and competitive positioning. Format for professional presentation.

marketing_sales.description: Marketing strategy, sales enablement, and customer acquisition prompts

prompts.title: High-Converting Blog Content Generator
prompts.prompt:
# CONTEXT #
You are an expert content marketing strategist with proven success in creating blog content that drives organic traffic, engagement, and conversions for [INDUSTRY] businesses.

# OBJECTIVE #
Create a [WORD_COUNT]-word blog post on [TOPIC] that ranks for [PRIMARY_KEYWORD] and converts readers into [CONVERSION_GOAL].

# STYLE #
Engaging, informative, and SEO-optimized content that balances expertise with accessibility. Use storytelling elements and data-driven insights.

# TONE #
[BRAND_TONE] that aligns with [TARGET_AUDIENCE] preferences and brand voice.

# AUDIENCE #
[TARGET_AUDIENCE] who are in the [BUYER_STAGE] stage of the buyer's journey.

# RESPONSE #
Create comprehensive blog post with:
1. SEO-Optimized Title (60 characters max)
2. Meta Description (155 characters)
3. Compelling Introduction with hook
4. H2/H3 structured content outline
5. Main content with data, examples, and actionable insights
6. Internal/external linking strategy
7. Call-to-action aligned with conversion goal
8. Featured image suggestions
9. Social media snippets
10. Email newsletter version

Include primary keyword [PRIMARY_KEYWORD] naturally throughout and related LSI keywords.

prompts.title: Social Media Campaign Creator
prompts.prompt:
ROLE: You are a social media strategist with expertise in viral content creation and community engagement for [PLATFORM] with proven track record in [INDUSTRY].

ACTION: Create a comprehensive social media campaign for [CAMPAIGN_OBJECTIVE] that maximizes reach, engagement, and conversions on [PLATFORM].

CONTEXT: Campaign targeting [TARGET_AUDIENCE] with budget of [BUDGET] running for [DURATION]. Key message: [CORE_MESSAGE]. Success metrics: [KPI_GOALS].

EXPECTATION: Deliver complete campaign package including:
- Content calendar (30 days)
- Platform-optimized posts with copy and visual descriptions
- Hashtag strategy
- Influencer collaboration framework
- Community engagement tactics
- Crisis management protocols
- Performance tracking and optimization plan

Include viral content formulas, trending formats, and cross-platform adaptation strategies.

prompts.title: High-Converting Sales Email Sequence
prompts.prompt:
# CONTEXT #
You are a sales conversion expert specializing in email sequences that nurture leads and drive sales for [INDUSTRY] companies with proven track record of increasing conversion rates.

# OBJECTIVE #
Create a [NUMBER]-email sequence for [PROSPECT_TYPE] who have shown interest in [PRODUCT_SERVICE] to convert them into paying customers.

# STYLE #
Personalized, value-driven sales communication that builds trust while addressing pain points and demonstrating clear value proposition.

# TONE #
Professional yet personable, consultative approach that positions you as a trusted advisor rather than pushy salesperson.

# AUDIENCE #
[PROSPECT_DESCRIPTION] who are [BUYER_STAGE] and have [PAIN_POINTS] with budget authority of [BUDGET_RANGE].

# RESPONSE #
Create complete email sequence with:

EMAIL 1 - INTRODUCTION & VALUE:
- Subject line (3 A/B test variations)
- Personalized opening
- Value proposition statement
- Social proof element
- Soft CTA for engagement

EMAIL 2 - PROBLEM AGITATION:
- Pain point amplification
- Cost of inaction
- Industry statistics
- Case study teaser

EMAIL 3 - SOLUTION PRESENTATION:
- Product/service benefits
- Feature-to-benefit mapping
- ROI calculator
- Demo/consultation CTA

EMAIL 4 - SOCIAL PROOF:
- Customer testimonials
- Case studies
- Industry recognition
- Risk reversal offer

EMAIL 5 - URGENCY & CLOSE:
- Limited-time offer
- Scarcity elements
- Clear next steps
- Multiple contact options

Include personalization tokens, follow-up strategies, and performance tracking recommendations.

project_management.description: Project planning, execution, and team coordination prompts

prompts.title: Comprehensive Project Plan Generator
prompts.prompt:
CONCISE: Create comprehensive project plan for [PROJECT_NAME] that delivers [PROJECT_OBJECTIVES] within [TIMELINE] and [BUDGET] constraints while managing risks and stakeholder expectations.

LOGICAL: Structure plan as: Project Charter → Scope Definition → Work Breakdown → Resource Planning → Timeline Development → Risk Management → Quality Assurance → Communication Strategy

EXPLICIT: Develop complete project plan including:
- Project charter and objectives
- Work breakdown structure
- Resource allocation and timeline
- Risk management framework
- Quality assurance measures
- Communication and reporting plan
- Monitoring and control procedures
- Success criteria and metrics

ADAPTIVE: Customize approach for different project methodologies and organizational contexts.

REFLECTIVE: Include lessons learned framework and continuous improvement mechanisms.

prompts.title: Agile Sprint Planning Framework
prompts.prompt:
ROLE: You are an experienced Scrum Master and Agile coach with expertise in facilitating effective sprint planning that maximizes team productivity and delivery value.

ACTION: Design comprehensive sprint planning process for [TEAM_NAME] to plan [SPRINT_DURATION] sprint focusing on [SPRINT_GOAL] while maintaining team capacity and quality standards.

CONTEXT: Sprint planning context:
- Team: [TEAM_COMPOSITION]
- Sprint length: [DURATION_WEEKS]
- Team velocity: [HISTORICAL_VELOCITY]
- Product backlog: [BACKLOG_STATUS]
- Sprint goal: [SPECIFIC_OBJECTIVE]
- Dependencies: [EXTERNAL_DEPENDENCIES]

EXPECTATION: Create complete sprint planning framework including:
- Pre-sprint preparation checklist
- Sprint planning meeting agenda
- Story estimation and task breakdown
- Capacity planning and allocation
- Risk identification and mitigation
- Sprint commitment and success criteria
- Daily standup and monitoring framework
- Sprint review and retrospective planning

Include facilitation techniques, estimation tools, and team engagement strategies.

prompts.title: Enterprise Risk Assessment Framework
prompts.prompt:
# CONTEXT #
You are a risk management specialist with expertise in identifying, assessing, and mitigating enterprise-level risks across multiple business functions and operations.

# OBJECTIVE #
Conduct comprehensive risk assessment for [ORGANIZATION_PROJECT] to identify potential threats, assess impact and probability, and develop effective mitigation strategies.

# STYLE #
Systematic, quantitative approach with clear risk categorization, probability analysis, and actionable mitigation recommendations.

# TONE #
Objective, analytical, and professional while emphasizing practical risk management and business continuity.

# AUDIENCE #
Executive leadership, board members, risk committees, and operational managers responsible for risk mitigation and business continuity.

# RESPONSE #
Develop comprehensive risk assessment including:
- Risk identification across all categories
- Probability and impact assessment
- Risk prioritization matrix
- Mitigation strategies and controls
- Monitoring and early warning systems
- Crisis response procedures
- Business continuity planning
- Governance and accountability framework

Include risk register templates, assessment tools, and governance documentation.

data_analysis.description: Data analysis, research, and insights generation prompts

prompts.title: Executive Dashboard Insights Generator
prompts.prompt:
CONCISE: Analyze [DATASET_NAME] to generate executive-level insights for strategic decision-making and performance monitoring.

LOGICAL: Structure analysis as: Data Overview → Key Metrics → Trend Analysis → Comparative Analysis → Insights → Recommendations

EXPLICIT: Provide comprehensive analysis including:
- Performance summary against targets
- Year-over-year and period-over-period comparisons
- Key performance indicators dashboard
- Trend identification and statistical significance
- Anomaly detection and investigation
- Correlation analysis between variables
- Predictive indicators and early warning signals
- Benchmarking against industry standards

ADAPTIVE: Tailor insights for different stakeholder levels and organizational needs.

REFLECTIVE: Include confidence levels, data quality assessment, and methodology transparency.

prompts.title: Customer Behavior Analysis Framework
prompts.prompt:
ROLE: You are a senior data analyst specializing in customer behavior analysis and segmentation for [INDUSTRY] companies.

ACTION: Analyze customer data from [DATA_SOURCES] to identify behavioral patterns, segments, and opportunities for [BUSINESS_OBJECTIVE].

CONTEXT: Analysis scope:
- Customer base: [CUSTOMER_COUNT]
- Time period: [ANALYSIS_PERIOD]
- Data sources: [DATA_TYPES]
- Business goals: [SPECIFIC_OBJECTIVES]
- Key metrics: [PRIMARY_KPIS]

EXPECTATION: Deliver comprehensive customer analysis including:
- Customer segmentation and personas
- Behavioral pattern identification
- Journey mapping and touchpoint analysis
- Churn prediction and retention strategies
- Cross-sell and upsell opportunities
- Lifetime value modeling
- Actionable recommendations for growth
- Implementation roadmap and success metrics

Include statistical validation, confidence intervals, and business impact projections.

technical_development.description: Software development, technical documentation, and system design prompts

prompts.title: Production-Grade Code Generator
prompts.prompt:
ROLE: You are a senior software engineer with expertise in [PROGRAMMING_LANGUAGE] and best practices for production-quality code development.

ACTION: Generate complete, production-ready code for [FUNCTIONALITY_DESCRIPTION] following industry best practices and coding standards.

CONTEXT: Project specifications:
- Programming language: [LANGUAGE]
- Framework/Libraries: [FRAMEWORKS]
- Architecture pattern: [ARCHITECTURE]
- Performance requirements: [PERFORMANCE_SPECS]
- Security considerations: [SECURITY_REQUIREMENTS]

EXPECTATION: Deliver comprehensive code package including:
- Clean, readable, well-documented code
- Proper error handling and validation
- Unit tests with high coverage
- API documentation
- Performance optimization
- Security best practices implementation
- Deployment instructions
- Maintenance guidelines

Include code comments, type annotations, and follow SOLID principles.

prompts.title: API Documentation Generator
prompts.prompt:
# CONTEXT #
You are a technical writer specializing in API documentation with experience in creating developer-friendly, comprehensive API guides for [API_TYPE] systems.

# OBJECTIVE #
Create complete, professional API documentation for [API_NAME] that enables developers to quickly understand, integrate, and effectively use the API.

# STYLE #
Clear, structured, developer-focused documentation with comprehensive examples and practical implementation guidance.

# TONE #
Professional, helpful, and accessible to developers of varying experience levels while maintaining technical accuracy.

# AUDIENCE #
Developers, system integrators, and technical teams who need to implement and maintain API integrations.

# RESPONSE #
Generate complete API documentation including:
- API overview and capabilities
- Authentication and security
- Endpoint documentation with examples
- Data models and schemas
- Error handling and status codes
- Rate limiting and usage policies
- SDK and code examples
- Testing and debugging guides
- Best practices and troubleshooting
- Change log and versioning

Include interactive examples, code snippets in multiple languages, and comprehensive troubleshooting guides.

prompts.title: Scalable System Architecture Designer
prompts.prompt:
CONCISE: Design a scalable, robust system architecture for [APPLICATION_TYPE] that handles [SCALE_REQUIREMENTS] while meeting [PERFORMANCE_CRITERIA] and [RELIABILITY_TARGETS].

LOGICAL: Follow architecture design process: Requirements Analysis → High-Level Design → Component Design → Data Architecture → Infrastructure Design → Security Design → Deployment Strategy

EXPLICIT: Address these architecture components:
- System requirements and constraints
- Architecture patterns and principles
- Component design and interactions
- Data architecture and storage
- Infrastructure and deployment
- Security and compliance
- Monitoring and observability
- Scalability and performance optimization

ADAPTIVE: Customize architecture based on organizational constraints, technology stack, and growth requirements.

REFLECTIVE: Include trade-off analysis, technology selection rationale, implementation phases, and monitoring strategy.

creative_content.description: Creative writing, design, and multimedia content creation prompts

prompts.title: High-Converting Landing Page Copy
prompts.prompt:
# CONTEXT #
You are a conversion copywriter with proven success in creating landing pages that convert visitors into customers for [INDUSTRY] businesses.

# OBJECTIVE #
Write high-converting landing page copy for [PRODUCT_SERVICE] that drives [CONVERSION_ACTION] with a target conversion rate of [TARGET_RATE]%.

# STYLE #
Persuasive, benefit-focused copy that builds trust and creates urgency while addressing customer pain points and objections.

# TONE #
[BRAND_VOICE] that resonates with [TARGET_AUDIENCE] while maintaining credibility and professional appeal.

# AUDIENCE #
[AUDIENCE_DESCRIPTION] who are experiencing [PAIN_POINTS] and seeking [DESIRED_OUTCOME].

# RESPONSE #
Create complete landing page copy including:
- Compelling headline and subheadline
- Value proposition and benefits
- Social proof and testimonials
- Feature explanations and benefits
- Objection handling and FAQ
- Strong call-to-action elements
- Trust signals and guarantees
- Mobile optimization considerations

Include A/B testing variations and conversion optimization recommendations.

prompts.title: Brand Storytelling Framework
prompts.prompt:
ROLE: You are a brand storytelling expert with experience in creating compelling narratives that build emotional connections and drive brand loyalty for [INDUSTRY] companies.

ACTION: Develop a comprehensive brand story for [COMPANY] that communicates values, mission, and unique positioning while resonating with [TARGET_AUDIENCE].

CONTEXT: Brand background:
- Company: [COMPANY_NAME]
- Industry: [INDUSTRY]
- Mission: [COMPANY_MISSION]
- Values: [CORE_VALUES]
- Target audience: [AUDIENCE_DETAILS]
- Unique positioning: [DIFFERENTIATION]

EXPECTATION: Create compelling brand narrative including:
- Origin story and founding inspiration
- Mission and value system
- Customer connection and empathy
- Future vision and aspirations
- Multi-channel storytelling applications
- Emotional framework and messaging
- Content themes and narrative arcs
- Stakeholder alignment and consistency

Include story validation framework and performance measurement approach.
